document_data.name: Borwald Firehammer
document_data.mainbody: '''Borwald Firehammer''' was the chief advisor of [[Horgar Steelshadow]] in [[Gracklstugh]] during the [[Silence of Lolth]].
document_data.History: Borwald was one of the most loyal followers of Horgar and was his chief advisor and marshal of the army. In [[1372 DR]], after seizing power, Horgar instructed him to prepare the army to march upon [[Menzoberranzan]], as planned with [[Nimor Imphraezl]].
